docs.title: About
docs.text:
Hi 👋, I'm Lucas Pereira
  • 📍 Paris
  • 📚 French engineer made from ESPCI Paris & Mines ParisTech.
  • 💻 Data Science & Energy modelisation for Artelys. Previously, Rte & IEA
  • 💭 Interested in modelling in sectors with high technical and economic challenges such as energy systems, transport and environment.
Programming languages Software development
